biotools.summary: Conduct “global analysis” of DNA methylation data, particularly from the Illumina 450k Infinium platform. Instead of examining the effect of individual CpGs, the idea is to compare the overall profile or distribution of CpG measurements across individuals.

bioschemas.name: GAMP
bioschemas.summary: Conduct “global analysis” of DNA methylation data, particularly from the Illumina 450k Infinium platform. Instead of examining the effect of individual CpGs, the idea is to compare the overall profile or distribution of CpG measurements across individuals.
